{{also|Dauern}} ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈdaʊ̯ɐn/}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{etyl|gmh|de}} {{m|gmh|dūren}}, borrowed from {{etyl|gml|de}} {{m|gml|dūren}}, itself from {{etyl|la|de}} {{m|la|durāre}}, infinitive of {{m|la|durō}}. Compare {{cog|nl|duren}}. ====Verb==== {{de-verb-weak|dauert|dauerte|gedauert}} # to [[last]], to [[continue]] over time # to [[persist]] # to [[take]] {{gloss|time}} =====Derived terms===== * {{l|de|ausdauern}} * {{l|de|Dauer}} * {{l|de|dauerhaft}} * {{l|de|andauern}} ===Etymology 2=== See {{m|de|bedauern}}. ====Verb==== {{de-verb-weak|dauert|dauerte|gedauert}} # {{lb|de|archaic|with accusative}} to [[grieve]]; to [[arouse]] [[pity]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|leidtun}} * {{l|de|schmerzen}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|bedauern}} ===Conjugation=== {{de-conj-weak-ern|dau|gedauert|h}}
